TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted but everyone creates a giant super weapon and suddenly have a large asteroid that could cause mass extinction

 

I wish for a car

Granted, you have a micromachine toy car. (Do you feel old if you did not need to google that?)

i wish for a nice dr pepper

072402132021

new page post 2

Edited February 13, 2021 by AlamoVampire

52 minutes ago, AlamoVampire said:

Granted, you have a micromachine toy car. (Do you feel old if you did not need to google that?)

i wish for a nice dr pepper

072402132021

new page post 2

I don't see how micromachine car corrupts my wishes but ok

*Cough*

Granted but the taste will be the same as Red Hot habanero

 

I wish for spinach

Granted, you eat too much and explode.

I wish for airlines to continue using tri and quad jets.

Granted. Boeing and Airbus planes now carry two disabled backup engines.

  

On 2/12/2021 at 4:39 PM, Popestar said:

I wish I was a Kerbal.

Granted. You've eaten a two-days-old sandwich. Now you're green-faced and big-eyed.

***

I wish Jeb Kerman came to Space-X

Granted. He crashes starship into your house.

I’m I wish for some chocolate.

Granted.  You are boiled alive in a vat of hot chocolate.  A painful, but tasty, way to go.

I wish the magnet on my shower door was working.

Granted. It is now a super magnet, and All metallic objects on Earth zoom towards it, crushing you and your house.

I wish for some coffee.

You get a microliter of coffee

I wish for irl physics to be kerbal physics

Granted, now you try out the physics and die in a crash trying to fly an SSTO without your pilot license.

 

I wish for all dogs to be dashunds.

Granted. They are now our canine overlords, thanks to Rick Sanchez.

Spoiler

I love Rick and  Morty!! 

I wish for all humans to be kerbals

Granted.  Now the dog overlords use us in simulated space flight, and we die and respawn over and over.

I wish I was one of the canine overlords.

50 minutes ago, Popestar said:

Granted.  Now the dog overlords use us in simulated space flight, and we die and respawn over and over.

I wish I was one of the canine overlords.

Granted. Your name is snowball, because your fur is white like snow.

Spoiler

Rick and Morty rules!!

why does this matter?

It makes you a very obvious target for the human-led resistance, of course! Needless to say, you are the overlord for only a few days.

I wish for a portal gun. 

Spoiler

I tried Portal for the first time a couple days ago....man, it’s awesome!!

Granted, it ends up being the transmogfiier gun from Calvin and Hobbes and you turn yourself into a worm.

I wish for the North American public transportation system to be better.

13 hours ago, Mukita12 said:

I don't see how micromachine car corrupts my wishes but ok

*Cough*

Granted but the taste will be the same as Red Hot habanero

 

I wish for spinach

It is reasonable to believe you had wished for a car that you could drive in, so giving you a micromachine toy car corrupts it.

to the wish above this post: granted, but to use it you must pay $3,000,000,000.99 each time.

i wish i had that kinda cash.

212702132021

Granted.  You HAD that kind of cash, but drugs and booze ain't cheap.  And the IRS took their share as well.

I wish I worked for the IRS.

Granted but you are forced to be audited for any and all income from age 3 years until the end of said audit. Then they let you work lol.

i wish for snow!

230102132021

Granted. It's so cold that you can see ammonia snow in the yard.

I wish to see ammonia snow in the yard.

granted. but it freezes all live on earth to dead.

i wish for a new habitable planet.

Granted. But it's flat like Earth.

I wish for 20 g of Mun ground.

granted. but it is made from stinking cheese and fungus starts to grow on it.

i wish for actual tasty cheese

Granted. You get a barrel of "casu marzu". Now you know what is "actual tasty cheese".

I wish to know why people eat all those strange decaying foods.

The reason suddenly appears in your mind. Now you are compelled to join in.

i wish for unlimited power!

074302152021

power is another word for energy. energy can be converted into mass using E=mc2. you have unlimited mass. you become a black hole.

i wish that REAL zombie pigmans were added back into minecraft.

Granted, but now you're one of them.

I wish for eternally working torches like in Minecraft.
